title: Whatever is happening, i cant even get my league client to start. Went through Repair and everything
body: Whatever is happening, i cant even get my league client to start. Went through Repair and everything. Whats the dealeo?

replies.body: Hey there, the deal here might be a security setting that's not letting your patcher launch.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide, which should fix things up!

Sounds like you're having problems getting the client to launch? Most of the time that's a sign that your OS doesn't have the right admin settings in place to allow League access to certain files. Update your permissions following the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and let me know if that helps. If not, give me a few more details of what is going wrong so I know what's happening exactly.
